channel.title: Remedy - Unique, Grand Exchange, Newest Clothing - Not Your Average Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VvXrL.png[/img]
[B]Developers:[/B] Mikey`
[B]Base:[/B] Project No-Doze
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CqLft.png[/img] The idea behind Remedy is to make an all-around fun server. Some mini-games, player-killing, skilling, every element, mixed into a server. The economy won't be too hard (besides a few items), and money making will be relatively easy, but not too easy. I'm looking forward to having a real economy that mostly relies on players.
In my opinion, nothing is flawless, no matter what, in Runescape emulation.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/97WBj.png[/img] [B]Server Features:[/B] • Amazing combat, virtually perfect • Sound/Music System • Following skills: Cooking, Crafting, Fishing, Fletching, Herblore, Mining, Runecrafting, Smithing, thieving, Woodcutting • 85% Dueling • Fight Pits • PVP Zones • Custom grand exchange • 85% Perfect clipping for following (a little buggy) • Every toggle-able option in-game saves on logout
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/wz11eU.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/zaHsZd.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/FiQwhb.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/5A3fGq.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/eUt3xD.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/LHMdWq.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/FlKGUn.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PE478.png[/img] [B]Client Features:[/B] • Base: Galkon's Refactored 474 look-a-like • 633 Items • 602 NPCs • 602 Animations & GFX • 508 Gameframe • New cursors • 90% Perfect Status Globes (Prayer/HP icons flash when below 25%) • 317, 474, and 641 Clothing/Hair • A lot of updated interfaces • Everything that toggles saves to the cache • Toggle-able features: Constitution, New Cursors, New Hitsplats, New HP Bar, Fog, New Menus • Constitution also makes the HP Status Globe show x10 hitpoints (Easy, but cool) • Run button and run orb synced together
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/yFxd1T.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/RmWVpt.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/YTRFqf.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/kyxBuI.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/1ExkWa.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/MrYAaE.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/iWNdGH.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/Lg0313.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/eBVcyy.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/1bWWGw.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/GfyjEn.png[/img] ^ Notice how it changes with constitution. [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/gFxVeD.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/VLVEzk.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/vTBmJI.png[/img] ^ Doesn't really prove it, but they are synced client sided.
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/VHg1dU.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/ytMzOm.png[/img] ^ Notice how it changes with constitution (healed 1HP before I took the lower picture).
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/qROzqS.png[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DsaWC0_QSww]YouTube - ‪[RSPS - 317] New Clothes/Hair (317, 474, Some 643)‬‏[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bRxW6MS3_SM]YouTube - ‪[RSPS - 317] Remedy 317 Custom Grand Exchange‬‏[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e9qlJbJ_u38]YouTube - ‪[RSPS 317] Remedy Sound Preview‬‏[/url]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Remedy - Unique, Grand Exchange, Newest Clothing - Not Your Average Server
item.dc:creator: @Mikey2 Mikey`
item.description:
@Mikey2 wrote:

[CENTER]

Developers:
Mikey`

Base: Project No-Doze


The idea behind Remedy is to make an all-around fun server.
Some mini-games, player-killing, skilling, every element, mixed into a server.
The economy won’t be too hard (besides a few items), and money making will be relatively easy, but not too easy.
I’m looking forward to having a real economy that mostly relies on players.

In my opinion, nothing is flawless, no matter what, in Runescape emulation.


Server Features:
• Amazing combat, virtually perfect
• Sound/Music System
• Following skills: Cooking, Crafting, Fishing, Fletching, Herblore, Mining, Runecrafting, Smithing, thieving, Woodcutting
• 85% Dueling
• Fight Pits
• PVP Zones
• Custom grand exchange
• 85% Perfect clipping for following (a little buggy)
• Every toggle-able option in-game saves on logout








Client Features:
• Base: Galkon’s Refactored 474 look-a-like
• 633 Items
• 602 NPCs
• 602 Animations & GFX
• 508 Gameframe
• New cursors
• 90% Perfect Status Globes (Prayer/HP icons flash when below 25%)
• 317, 474, and 641 Clothing/Hair
• A lot of updated interfaces
• Everything that toggles saves to the cache
• Toggle-able features: Constitution, New Cursors, New Hitsplats, New HP Bar, Fog, New Menus
• Constitution also makes the HP Status Globe show x10 hitpoints (Easy, but cool)
• Run button and run orb synced together












^ Notice how it changes with constitution.



^ Doesn’t really prove it, but they are synced client sided.



^ Notice how it changes with constitution (healed 1HP before I took the lower picture).

YouTube - ‪[RSPS - 317] New Clothes/Hair (317, 474, Some 643)‬‏
YouTube - ‪[RSPS - 317] Remedy 317 Custom Grand Exchange‬‏
YouTube - ‪[RSPS 317] Remedy Sound Preview‬‏

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
